name: Border Control Tactics
description: Strategies for monitoring, securing, and managing border operations to prevent illegal activities.

cards.title: Human Trafficking Detection
cards.description: Identifying and intercepting human trafficking operations at national borders.
bulletpoints: Recognize signs of coerced and trafficked individuals
Utilize biometric and database matching for identity verification
Work with international agencies to disrupt trafficking networks

cards.title: Drug Smuggling Prevention
cards.description: Detecting and intercepting illegal narcotics transported across borders.
bulletpoints: Identify concealment methods used in drug smuggling
Use canine units and chemical detection systems
Implement predictive analytics for trafficking patterns
